abstract: The two companies withdrew attack ads aimed at each other. They have been negotiating a new distribution contract for Disney-owned channels like ESPN.
snippet: The two companies withdrew attack ads aimed at each other. They have been negotiating a new distribution contract for Disney-owned channels like ESPN.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — It looks as though Time Warner Cable customers won’t lose ESPN after all.

headline.main: Time Warner Cable and Disney Are Near a Deal on Fees

byline.original: By Brooks Barnes and Brian Stelter
